bike.description: 6061 aluminum main tubes, over-sized seat tube, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: RST Blaze TNL, MCU/coil spring with Turn-n-Lock lock-out and external preload adjustor, 30mm stanchions, 80mm travel (13") 100mm travel (15-21")
Alex TD25 double-wall disc-specific rims with reinforced spoke bed, powder coated, 32H, alloy 6-bolt disc hubs with QR, 14g black stainless steel spokes
Shimano Acera M360 rear and Acera M310 front
Shimano M311, alloy crank arms, 42/32/22T rings, 170mm
ATB platform, hi-impact resin cage & body
Tektro HDC-300 hydraulic disc brakes with 6" rotors
Jamis XC riser, 6JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 13mm rise x 620mm
Jamis XC alloy threadless, 10JAMIS_DEGREE rise x 90mm (13-15"), 100mm (17"), 110mm (19") and 120mm (21")
Jamis ATB Sport with pressure relief channel, SL cover, protective front and rear guards
